title: Diamond-Studded Gold Bangles - Kiranavali
materials: 22K Gold; Round Cut Diamonds (estimated VS Clarity
features: Contemporary bangle design featuring uniformly spaced round-cut diamonds set within a minimalist gold structure. The gold is crafted into sleek, geometric accents between each diamond, enhancing the brilliance and fire of the stones. The polished gold finish radiates a warm glow.
occasions: or as a sophisticated gift for a loved one.
description: Modern yet elegant bangle set crafted with meticulous attention to detail. The high-quality diamonds and radiant gold create a luxurious and timeless piece. The minimalist design ensures versatility, allowing it to be paired with both traditional and contemporary attire. Durable and comfortable for daily wear.
